name: Web Developer
description: Hi There, I'm Nisanth, a Front-End Developer & freelancer with more than 2+ years of experience. I have designed and developed many responsive and adaptive websites. I can improve the loading speed both on mobile and desktop by applying the recommendations of Google Lighthouse. Apart from that, I have studied the art and technique ofTypography and, also I'm talented in UX/UI design, skilled in Figma.
